<a id="class_TextureCubemapRD"></a>

# TextureCubemapRD

**Inherits:** [TextureLayeredRD](class_texturelayeredrd.md) **<** [TextureLayered](class_texturelayered.md) **<** [Texture](class_texture.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Texture for Cubemap that is bound to a texture created on the [RenderingDevice](class_renderingdevice.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This texture class allows you to use a cubemap texture created directly on the [RenderingDevice](class_renderingdevice.md) as a texture for materials, meshes, etc.
